backend/main.mo: Defines types and CRUD logic for book projects, including characters, worldbuilding categories, and prologue, with conversion helpers for returning view models.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated source files, components used, test IDs, and confidence levels for the project's feature set.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend files, summarizing their purpose within the React application.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles using warm OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell handling theme, project selection, navigation tabs, and page rendering for characters, worldbuilding, and prologue.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders the app header with logo, title, and a decorative hero image.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: A form component for creating a character with multiple text sections and submission via addCharacter mutation.
Displays a character’s filled sections in card format, showing background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, and role.
frontend/src/components/ExportProjectBut: Button that exports the selected project as a Markdown file with toast notifications.
Dropdown UI for creating, selecting, renaming, and deleting projects with dialog prompts and backend calls.
frontend/src/components/prologue/Prologu: Editor for writing and saving prologue sections with accordion-based inputs and savePrologue mutation.
Shows a read‑only outline of the prologue sections and an optional draft if present.
frontend/src/components/worldbuilding/Wo: Allows editing a worldbuilding category’s description and adding notes using update and add mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, logout, identity storage, and authentication state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrap actor calls to fetch and mutate project, character, and worldbuilding data with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and typography tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/exportProject.ts: Generates a Markdown export of a project’s characters, worldbuilding, and prologue, then triggers a file download.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/sections/CharactersPage.tsx: UI for listing, creating, and viewing characters using dialogs and questionnaire/summary components.
frontend/src/sections/ProloguePage.tsx: Provides editor and outline tabs for viewing and editing a project's prologue.
Displays worldbuilding categories in an accordion with editors for each section.
frontend/src/state/useProjects.ts: Manages project selection, persistence, and loading using React state and project-fetching hooks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions for colors, typography, containers, animations, and including typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the book‑writing web app, its features, requirements, and image needs for the UI.
